title: The Spa, NYC | Equinox Hotel New York
description: Select from our Spa integrated circuits that include cryotherapy, infrared sauna, quantum harmonics session+massage, facials & bodywork or skin therapies.
cleaned_text: INNER + OUTER BODY EXCELLENCE Select from our integrated circuit treatments - inter-modal, multi-treatment experiences, cryotherapy, infrared sauna, NutriDrip IV drips, quantum harmonics sessions, massages, body work and skin therapies - or create your own circuit from our innovative treatments and add on amplifiers, developed by a team of internationally recognized medical authorities and therapists renowned for their mastery of healing. BEAUTY CIRCUIT FACIALS + BODY TREATMENTS Highly sophisticated facial and body optimizations, natural and non-invasive techniques, products, and solutions that delivers optimal skin health, function, and appearance. FACIALS + BODY TREATMENTS DR. LARA DEVGAN World renowned plastic surgeon Dr. Lara Devgan is best known for her use of modern technology to achieve subtle facial optimizations- using everything from lasers to injectables to facelift surgery. Her medical-grade product line is formulated to improve visible tissue quality, boost collagen, and enhance the evenness of the skin. THE GOLD COLLAGEN FACIAL BY DR. LARA DEVGAN Add-ons include: Platinum Lip Plumping Serum This is a hydrating, brightening, pore refining facial with steaming, lymphatic massage, and gold collagen mask application for tissue support. Dr. Devgan Microdermabrasion Scrub is used for a deep tissue lymphatic massage and microdermabrasion exfoliation, to rid the face of impurities and leave it looking smoother and softer. Mixed molecular weight, niacinamide-fortified hyaluronic serum and vitamin CBE ferulic are massaged into the tissues to improve barrier protection, hydration, collagen support, and brightening. The power of Peptides, Resveratrol, and Vitamin E are used to improve the visible appearance of fine lines. AUGUSTINUS BADER Augustinus Bader is a premium, science-led skincare line that launched in 2018 and is backed by the highest caliber of applied science in the industry. The product addresses everything from the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to redness and elasticity. THE METHOD BY AUGUSTINUS BADER The Method uses Augustinus Bader's groundbreaking technology to create a one-of-a-kind, highly sophisticated facial experience. The visible results are powered by TFC8®, a smart signaling technology that supports the skin's innate biological wisdom to renew and regenerate. Incorporating a special fascia massage, The Method promotes a sequence of personalized regenerative processes for skin hydration, firmness, evenness, and protection against environmental aggressors. BIOLOGIQUE RECHERCHE Recherche - the foundation of the Biologique Recherche methodology's reputation for efficacy rests on the combination of a clinical approach to personalized cosmetic treatment; pure, concentrated, almost raw products; complex formulas; and rigorous original treatments. EQUINOX CUSTOMIZED FACIAL Each facial is highly customized utilizing unique formulas that are rich in botanicals, marine and biotechnical extracts. These formulas are combined with specific massage gestures to achieve immediate and long lasting results REMODELING LIFT FACIAL Unparalleled technology through a combination of 3 types of electrical currents to improve the absorption of the active ingredients, reshapes and tones, and revitalize the epidermis. The results are visibly lifted and toned skin, wider-looking eyes, more prominent cheek bones, softer wrinkles and better defined facial contour. ANTIAGING + LIFTING FACIAL An exclusive facial only available at Equinox Hotel, New York. Get red-carpet ready and turn back the clock with this customized tech facial. Treatment includes: the remodeling face machine, micro-puncture, hyaluronic treatment and collagen finishing mask. The facial addresses loss of volume, fine lines and helps plump and tone the skin. SECONDE PEAU FACIAL The Seconde Peau treatment accelerates cell renewal and optimizes healing for a visible and immediate tightening effect. It increases cohesion, firmness, and density of the skin. Seconde Peau is an electrospun mask strip made up of 80% Hyaluronic Acid of medical origin. This revolutionary facial utilizes a form of electrospun pharmaceutical grade hyaluronic acid, known for its incredible ability to plump and hydrate the skin, to visibly treat wrinkles and provide a genuine alternative to conventional fillers. THE ULTIMATE ANTIAGING + LIFTING FACIAL Our signature facial using Biologique Recherche skincare and Jet Peel technology. Take years off your face with this customized, popular facial. This treatment includes: a customized facial and Jet Peel exfoliation and infusion of nutrients, and specific serums to address loss of volume, boost collagen, glow and cellular regeneration. Fine lines, wrinkles and hollows are diminished. MENS HIGH PERFORMANCE FACIAL FACIAL Tailored specifically for men, this facial will renew and detoxify the skin. A deep cleanse, enzyme exfoliation, and an extended facial massage will meet the demands every man's skincare needs. DR. TRAVALL ACUPUNCTURE FACE TREATMENT FACE LIFTING Dr. Travall is an acupuncturist specializing in cosmetic, orthopedics and sports medicine. He is highly regarded for his beauty amplifying facials which target & lift facial muscles, creating long lasting facial contouring and sculpting results. This treatment includes 5 main components; two that relax and tone facial muscles with acupuncture and micro-current probes, and three that tone and tighten the skin with high frequency therapy, micro-current applied through a sheet mask, light therapy, gua sha and facial cupping. ADD ON INTENSIVE SHEET MASKS COLLAGEN FÉERIE FACE + NECK Moisturizing and soothing Collagen sheet mask ideal for all skin types. Skin is hydrated, plumped and firm. MASQUE PIGM 400 Brightening and oxygenating sheet mask to prevent and reduce the visibility of pigmentation spots for uneven and dull complexions. MASQUE PLATYSMA Toning, Rejuvenating, hydrating mask specifically tailored to the chin area, to tighten and contour loose skin. ACIDES DE FRUITS PEEL Mild fruit acid chemical peel for all skin types. Skin is exfoliated and regenerated while refining the skin surface and evening out skin tone. EXFOLIANT P50 VISAGE Exfoliating and brightening treatment for sensitive, dull skin. Skin looks luminous, pigmentation and fine lines are reduced. BODY PERFECTOR RESET + RECHARGE We start this full body experience by scrubbing you head to toe, resurfacing and smoothing your skin from all of life's daily stressors. Using LED Light to calm inflammation, build collagen, and speed the healing of the body. This treatment works for resurfacing, polishing, and improving the appearance of cellulite. MICROJET STREAMING + INFUSION TECHNOLOGY Powerful 3-phase treatment of lymphatic drainage, exfoliation, and serums targeted to penetrate deep into the dermal layers to restore vital radiance via this cutting-edge technology CHIN | NECK | DÉCOLLETÉ EYES SCALP HANDS ADD-ON AMPLIFIERS SCALP + HAIR TREATMENT Stimulating massage combined with deep conditioning mask VIBRATION TECH Intense high-speed vibration and percussion therapy to increase circulation and mobility. NECK TONE + LIFT Tighten, tone and lift the skin under the chin and neck to reduce lines and signs of aging. LYMPHATIC DRAINAGE BODY TREATMENTS The Icoone Robodern is a non invasive tech treatment that delivers customized lymphatic drainage and body slimming to help shape the silhouette. This treatment delivers customized draining, firming and body remodeling to rejuvenate skin and tissue, reducing cellulite while boosting circulation and enhancing the performance of your lymphatic system. In addition to the aesthetic benefits, it helps remove toxins from the body, relieve muscle tension and soreness, improves digestion and gut health, and accelerates the production of elastin, resulting in smoother, firmer, and more toned skin in only a few sessions DETOX + SLIMMING LYMPHATIC DRAINAGE Achieve optimal outer + inner body excellence. Shapes the body, firms the skin, reduces the appearance of cellulite, relieves muscle pains, improves blood circulation + optimizes lymphatic drainage. Eliminates toxins from the body and improving immunity while creating a slimmer waist with LASER add on MAXIMUM RESULTS ACCELERATED CIRCUIT 3x TREATMENTS / WEEK Combining high tech + high touch, this accelerated program is designed to enhance your silhouette in just 3 weeks. A weekly program of 2 x Detox + Slimming treatments, combined with 1 x Biologique Recherche Silhouette Shaper manual body sculpting treatment. BODY TREATMENTS Biologique Recherche regimen is a manual treatment revered for its highly effective results for the body. SILHOUETTE SHAPER Stimulating, contouring body treatment which combines lymphatic drainage, deep anti-cellulite massage and glove sculpting to shape, contour the waist and target cellulite. Enhanced by concentrated active ingredients that stimulate tissues and help break down adipose cells. This creates a more contoured shape, while making skin look smooth and toned. The ultimate hour glass silhouette shaper. *90 min treatment targets the waist, inner + outer thigh and hip area POLISH + GLOW Regenerate and hydrate your body with a combination of exfoliating active ingredients and massage techniques. This treatment is beneficial for dehydrated skin in need of a deep exfoliation and hydration. A combination of acids and mechanical exfoliation reveals smoother skin texture, followed by a massaging application of hydrating cream to replenish moisture for a toned and glowing silhouette. HAIR STYLING We offer a variety of hair care services. CUT + STYLE BLOW DRY BLOW DRY WITH EXTENSIONS UPDO GLAMOR WAVES ONLY IN ROOM STYLING RESTORATIVE HAIR TREATMENTS + BLOW DRY HAIR RITUEL BY SISLEY REGENERATIVE HAIR CARE MASK BY OLAPLEX OR MILBON [View Menu](https://equinox-hotels.com/) PERFORMACE HEALING CIRCUIT MASSAGE + ACUPUNCTURE Highly functional body work, deep tissue, craniosacral and lymphatic drainage to help to promote deep recovery. Our massages help reboot the mind and the body through msucular release and bodywork techniques. MASSAGE + ACUPUNCTURE THE E.MASSAGE Signature Treatment Highly personalized combination of rejuvenating and therapeutic massage techniques designed to address muscle tension and flexibility. Light table stretches enable the joints and ligaments to be more limber to promote enhanced tissue massage. Head to toe relaxation using breathing rituals and ending with a warm, moisturizing foot treatment. The ultimate wellness massage. THE E. DEEP MASSAGE Higher intensity for overworked + fatigued muscles Highly personalized combination of rejuvenating and therapeutic massage techniques designed to address muscle tension and flexibility. Light table stretches enable the joints and ligaments to be more limber to promote enhanced tissue massage. Head to toe relaxation using breathing rituals and ending with a warm, moisturizing foot treatment. The ultimate wellness massage. CBD RECOVER.E Pain Relief | Recovery Enhance athletic performance and rapid recovery of musculature with a blend of mobility and alignment techniques, deep tissue massage, and CBD healing balm, targeted to relieve or prevent injury, improve flexibility, and boost mind and body performance. E.NERGIZE Restore | Energize Crystal-infused essential oils are combined with intuitive bodywork and healing gemstones to balance and restore optimal energy flow. LYMPHATIC DRAINAGE MASSAGE Regenerate Light pressure massage strokes are performed rhythmically and evenly to stimulate better flow of fluids through the lymphatic system. This renews the cells, expedites the removal of toxins and strengthens the immune system. ADD-ON AMPLIFIERS CRYO SPOT LED HOT STONES DR. TRAVALL | ACUPUNCTURE Dr. Travall is an acupuncturist specializing in cosmetic, orthopeditcs and sports medicine. His focus is on injury prevention, pain management, and beauty amplifying facials - blending both eastern and western practices allows Dr. Travall to treat his patients with a 360-approach to high-performance sports medicine. FACIAL LIFTING TREATMENT PAIN TREATMENT + MUSCLE REJUVENATION TRADITIONAL ACUPUNCTURE FACE LIFTING TREATMENT Targeting and educating facial muscles, create long lasting facial contouring and sculpting results. This treatment includes 5 main components; two that relax and tone facial muscles with acupuncture and micro-current probes, and three that tone and tighten the skin with high frequency therapy, micro- current applied through a sheet mask and light therapy. Gua sha and cupping are added to relax connective tissue and increase circulation. PAIN TREATMENT + MUSCLE REJUVENATION Muscle rejuvenation acupuncture is a muscle specific electrical stimulation treatment where the affected muscles are isolated, needled and a light electrical current is applied. This helps the nerve and muscle connection to relax and eases tightness and pain, while healing the muscle. This can be used to improve sports performance. TRADITIONAL ACUPUNCTURE Used for all internal issues: Anxiety, depression, stress, digestion and fertility. TARGETED Help to relieve joint and muscle soreness and inflammation. 6 SESSIONS 12 SESSIONS 20 SESSIONS UNLIMITED SESSIONS INFRARED SAUNA Calorie Burn| Circulation | Inflammation Reduction | Skin Improvement | Detox | Relaxation | Sleep Benefits INFRARED SAUNA CHAMBER Private infrared sauna delivers far-spectrum wavelengths to address muscle repair, cardiovascular health, pain relief, and cellular rejuvenation. [View Menu](#) NUTRITION CIRCUIT INNER BODY Essential nutrients, targeted antioxidants, superfoods, adaptogens, promoting peak performance and regenerative benefits through IV Therapy, and a curated selection of superfoods, adaptogenic drinks and nutrient dense meals. INNER BODY SUPERFOOD SPA MENU | 10AM - 4PM Many of the items on our menu contain functional, bio-active ingredients with exemplary health benefits. We want you to know what goes into our recipes — and your body. SUPERFOOD LATTES Superfoods are nutrient-dense, and they really pack a punch when part of a diverse diet. They can contain beneficial phytochemicals, antioxidants, vitamins & minerals, and various anti-inflammatory compounds. Not if it's minimally processed and nutrient-dense. Each one is a good source of energy, with plenty of fiber which can regulate appetite. And be sure to eat the crusts, since they contain eight times as much pronyl-lysine (a disease-fighting antioxidant) as the bread itself, due to reactions from baking at high temperatures.
